author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Axon Announces Proposed Public Offering Of Common Stock
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Axon Enterprise Inc:
* AXON ANNOUNCES PROPOSED PUBLIC OFFERING OF COMMON STOCK * AXON ENTERPRISE - COMMENCED PROPOSED PUBLIC OFFERING OF COMMON STOCK, INCLUDES 4.0 MILLION SHARES BY CO, 300,000 SHARES OFFERED BY CEO, PATRICK SMITH Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
